name: UITouch
desc: An object representing the location, size, movement, and force of a touch occurring on the screen.

items.name: location
items.desc: Returns the current location of the receiver in the coordinate system of the given view.

items.name: previousLocation
items.desc: Returns the previous location of the receiver in the coordinate system of the given view.

items.name: view
items.desc: The view to which touches are being delivered, if any.

items.name: window
items.desc: The window in which the touch initially occurred.

items.name: majorRadius
items.desc: The radius (in points) of the touch.

items.name: majorRadiusTolerance
items.desc: The tolerance (in points) of the touchâ€™s radius.

items.name: preciseLocation
items.desc: Returns a precise location for the touch, when available.

items.name: precisePreviousLocation
items.desc: Returns a precise previous location for the touch, when available.

items.name: tapCount
items.desc: The number of times the finger was tapped for this given touch.

items.name: timestamp
items.desc: The time when the touch occurred or when it was last mutated.

items.name: type
items.desc: The type of the touch.

items.name: UITouch.TouchType
items.desc: The type of touch received.

items.name: phase
items.desc: The phase of the touch.

items.name: UITouch.Phase
items.desc: The phase of a finger touch.

items.name: force
items.desc: The force of the touch, where a value of 1.0 represents the force of an average touch (predetermined by the system, not user-specific).

items.name: maximumPossibleForce
items.desc: The maximum possible force for a touch.

items.name: altitudeAngle
items.desc: The altitude (in radians) of the stylus.

items.name: azimuthAngle
items.desc: Returns the azimuth angle (in radians) of the stylus.

items.name: azimuthUnitVector
items.desc: Returns a unit vector that points in the direction of the azimuth of the stylus.

items.name: estimatedProperties
items.desc: A set of touch properties whose values contain only estimates.

items.name: estimatedPropertiesExpectingUpdates
items.desc: The set of touch properties for which updated values are expected in the future.

items.name: estimationUpdateIndex
items.desc: An index number that lets you correlate an updated touch with the original touch.

items.name: gestureRecognizers
items.desc: The gesture recognizers that are receiving the touch object.

items.name: location
items.desc: Returns the current location of the receiver in the coordinate system of the given node.

items.name: previousLocation
items.desc: Returns the previous location of the receiver in the coordinate system of the given node.
